TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Puyuma, title = Puyuma, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Puyuma} }

S.FORM: = Puyuma = Gaga mniq Taytung Taytungsu ka alang Puyuma. 1,136 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 3,132 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 39% niqan 1,233 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 61% niqan 1,899 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Puyuma28%, Amis6%, Paiwan1%, Bunun1%, ni rahuq na o2%.

= Poyoma = Gaga mniq Taytong Taytongso ka alang Poyoma. 1,136 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 3,132 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 39% niqan 1,233 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 61% niqan 1,899 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Poyoma28%, Amis6%, Paiwan1%, Bonon1%, ni rahoq na o2%.
